definitions.definition: To extol or honour in a solemn manner.
examples: to celebrate the name of the Most High

definitions.definition: To honour by rites , by ceremonies of joy and respect, or by refraining from ordinary business; to observe duly.
To engage in joyful activity in appreciation of an event.
examples: I was promoted today at work—let’s celebrate !

definitions.definition: To perform or participate in, as a sacrament or solemn rite ; to perform with appropriate rites.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To extol or honour in a solemn manner.
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To honour by rites , by ceremonies of joy and respect, or by refraining from ordinary business; to observe duly.
( transitive or intransitive ) To engage in joyful activity in appreciation of an event.
( transitive ) To perform or participate in, as a sacrament or solemn rite ; to perform with appropriate rites.
